content: 3d crochet heart pattern by turtlebunny creations - a simple 3d crochet heart perfect for valentine s day galentine s day anniversaries or any day you want to give a little love to someone special the 3d design makes it perfect as a gift topper pin cushion sachet ornament bean bag stress ball or attach it to another project to add a little love complete with pictures and tips this pattern incorporates basic stitches and is perfect for beginners some finishing with a needle recommended - every effort has been made to ensure this pattern is accurate and complete please don t hesitate to contact me if you have any questions or problems if you would like to share this pattern please share the link to this ravelry pattern page sales of your hearts are permitted but only when they are made by hand in a limited amount by the buyer of the pattern and include a reference to turtlebunny creations as the original designer when publishing photographs of the items please also tag or reference turtlebunny creations - copyright © 2019 chrissy callahan & turtlebunny productions increase all rights reserved for personal use only the pattern as well as the accompanying parts of the pattern photos pdfs etc may not be copied reproduced published exchanged or sold mechanically electronically or by any other means in whole or in part without written permission from chrissy callahan or turtlebunny productions increase
